transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan good afternoon sir Shivam baat kar raha hu main IndiaMART se Krinal sir se baat ho rahi hai na?
Customer: Haan. Web trading se baat ho rahi hai na meri Krinal sir.
Executive: Haan boliye boliye boliye.
Executive: Haan haan actually sir jo hamara last bar baat hua tha aapse mold ko leke jo aapke pass lead vagera receive ho raha hai na to aapne bataya tha ki Nancy ne kuch mail vagera kiya hai category creation ke liye.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan to abhi aapke pass lead vagera proper aane laga kyuki main abhi aapka wo dekh raha hu abhi aapka profile to usme sara kuch mold ka hi lead aa raha hai aur aapne jo mail kiya hai abhi hame.
Customer: Mold ka lead nahi aa raha hai wo concrete lead aa raha hai sir.
Executive: Accha nahi sir ek bar aap filter laga ke dekh rahe ho na actually aapki location mein agar dekhoge aap jo Gujarat ka location hai na.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Agar ek flush type manhole agar aap nearby dekh rahe ho na to ye manhole vagera aapko dikh raha hoga waha pe hai na.
Customer: Wo aisa nahi hai sir ye jo iski requirement aa rahi hai na.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Wo concrete ki concrete ki aa rahi hai concrete ka bana hua cheez dekha hota hai na wo.
Executive: Haan samajh gaya.
Customer: Haan abhi jaise abhi mere pass ek available hai yaha pe column mold karke to ye to hamara mold hi hai na.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aur ek hai friction slab mold for crash barrier.
Customer: Haan. 
Executive: Ye ye bhi hamara mold hai hai na.
Customer: Haan. 
Executive: Fir ek hamara RCC precast POP FRP mold sir ji main ek kam kar raha hu ki aapka jo register email id hai na.
Customer: Haan. 
Executive: Uspe aapko na ek mail share kar raha hu.
Customer: Bol theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai to ek bar aap join kar lo to main apna screen share karke iski jo relevant category hogi na wo remove kar dunga aur aapko bhi filter vagera bata dunga ki aap kaha se isko track karoge pura kyuki aap dekh rahe ho to aapko wo main product dikh raha hai jabki aapka pura kam product banane wala jo saman hota hai wo hai pura hai na.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Hai na to aapka jo register email id hai na uspe maine na aapko ek mail share kiya hai check karo koi Shivam Srivastava naam se aaya hai kya?
Customer: Haan.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving concrete leads instead of mold.



Resolution:

- Executive shared a mail to customer.
- Executive offered to share screen and remove category.
- Executive explained how to track the product.



Next Steps: 

- None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, category, filter, email
